item.title: Vanadi Coffee has once again increased its Bitcoin holdings by 5 coins, bringing the total holdings to 100 coins.
item.description: On August 25th, as per NLNico's monitoring, the Spanish coffee chain Vanadi Coffee once more increased its holdings by 5 bitcoins, resulting in its total holdings reaching 100 bitcoins.

item.title: Trump will sign an executive order on Monday
item.description: On August 25th, as per AXIOS, President Trump of the United States is scheduled to sign an executive order on Monday.

item.title: A whale has deposited 10.98 million USDC into Hyperliquid to leverage 3x and go long on XPL.
item.description: On August 25th, as monitored by LookOnChain, a whale deposited 10.98 million USDC into Hyperliquid to take a 3x long position on XPL. Currently, their position holds 161,700 XPL (valued at $8.76 million), and has an unrealized loss of $519,000.

item.title: Analyst: Ethereum's Short-Term Performance May Still Outperform Bitcoin
item.description: August 25th. The CryptoQuant analyst CryptoMe noted that recently, Ethereum has demonstrated a more robust trend compared to BTC. The rise in CME open interest and the fact that retail investors have not yet participated suggest that this disparity may persist in the short to medium term.

item.title: A certain Bitcoin ancient whale still holds over 40,000 ETH in a long position, now with an unrealized gain of over $11 million.
item.description: On August 25th, as per the monitoring of LookOnChain, a particular Bitcoin ancient whale still maintains a long position of 40,212 ETH (approximately $184 million), and the unrealized profits exceed $11 million.

item.title: In the past 24 hours, there has been a total of $806 million in liquidations across the network, with the majority coming from long positions.
item.description: On August 25th, based on the data from Coinglass, the total value that was liquidated across the entire network within the past 24 hours amounted to $806 million USD. Among them, there were $643 million USD in long liquidations and $163 million USD in short liquidations.

item.title: As Bitcoin Continues to Decline, U.S. Stock Cryptocurrency Concept Stocks Weaken Pre-market
item.description: On August 25th, based on market data, Bitcoin has been in a three-day consecutive decline, with pre-market weakness in U.S. stock cryptocurrency concept stocks. The ProShares Bitcoin Strategy ETF decreased by 4.3%, Riot Platforms (RIOT.O) dropped by 3.6%, and Marathon Digital (MARA.O) fell by 3.7%.

item.title: A Certain Bitcoin Ancient Whale Liquidated ETH Long Position to Take Profit, Making a $39.36 Million Profit in 3 Days
item.description: On August 25th, as per on-chain analyst Ai Auntie (@ai_9684xtpa), the "BTC Ancient Whale Who Slept for Seven Years and Took a High-Profile Leverage on ETH" has closed two ETH long positions for profit-taking, realizing a profit of $39.36 million within three days.

item.title: Bitcoin Briefly Drops Below $111,000
item.description: On August 25th, based on HTX market data, Bitcoin briefly fell below $111,000 and is now trading at $111,605, with a 24-hour decrease of 2.86%.

item.title: FTX/Alameda Collateral Address and FTX Liquidator Address currently hold a total of $10.03 billion USD SOL
item.description: Update, August 25th: Based on on-chain data, the staking address of FTX/Alameda currently holds 4,737,092 staked SOL. At the current SOL price, this is worth approximately $952 million. FTX/Alameda withdraws SOL around the 10th of each month.Furthermore, according to Arkham data, the liquidator address of FTX currently holds 255,076 SOL, which is approximately $51.27 million.Previously reported, Galaxy, Jump, and Multicoin are aiming to raise $1 billion to purchase SOL.
